career.name: UCSD XR Lab - Dr. Kirsh (CSE Dept.)
career.title: Software Engineer + AI Research Assistant
description: Migrating data pipeline from CSV stored in PostgreSQL database to HDF5 structure to increase speed of SER project

Building lab’s custom AI agents to reduce repetitive data annotation tasks by 30% for 3 ongoing lab projects
Researching non-Euclidean spaces’ effect on neural basis of spatial cognition and episodic memory in humans

career.name: UCSD LIL Lab - Dr. Zettersten (Cog Sci Dept.)

Revising sections of our research paper for the 2025-26 ACL Conference and consistently contributing to 20+ datasets

career.name: Dream Voyage

career.name: CodeREV Kids
